original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na āsavañca iva na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na āsavañca ca iva na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavañca ca iva na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo
analyzed: na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca na āsavaḥ ceva na anāsavaḥ ca na anāsavaḥ ceva na no ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca na anāsavam ca iva na noāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavañca ceva na anāsavañca na anāsavañca ceva

original: nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naanāsavañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca na anāsavam ca iva na noāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva

original: naanāsavo ca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ ca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
